title: Inflo: collaborative reasoning via open calculation graphs.
abstract: Inflo  is a web tool that introduces new ways to collaboratively construct and deconstruct logical arguments drawn as visual dataflow graphs.  Inflo  graphs are dynamic: nodes are logical propositions that can contain computations based on other nodes.  Inflo  nodes and graphs have URLs, permitting sharing via blogs, e-mails, papers, etc. People can collaboratively construct, refine, and adapt/reuse arguments by making changes to shared nodes. Combining community-curated nodes and using  Inflo's  nodes for computation, back-of-the-envelope calculations can rapidly be made.
